    • 方法详细资料

      • setVideoDisabled

        public boolean setVideoDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                boolean disable)
        Disable or restore video capacity of device. CAUTION: Restore operation will NOT change current set.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        disable - true means disable video capacity, false restore to normal status.
        返回:
        true means operation successful, false means failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have {com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_CAMERA}
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.

      • isVideoDisabled

        public boolean isVideoDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Determine whether or not device capacity of video is forbidden.
        参数:
        admin - The name of the admin component.
        返回:
        true means video capacity is forbidden.
